cards.name: Alysane Mormont
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, Alysane Mormont gains stealth during [military] challenges and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.
cards.flavor: "Mormont women are skinchangers. We turn into bears and find mates in the woods. Everyone knows."

cards.name: Old Gate
cards.text: Limited. Challenges Action: If each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, sacrifice Old Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

cards.name: The Knight of Flowers
cards.text: Shadow (5). Renown. Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, choose and stand a Kingsguard character. (Limit twice per round.)
cards.flavor: "When the sun has set, no candle can replace it."

cards.name: Gate of the Gods
cards.text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you control a character with the highest STR in play, sacrifice Gate of the Gods to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

cards.name: Aged Craftsman
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After Aged Craftsman enters play, search the top 10 cards of your deck for a [thenightswatch] location with printed cost 2 or lower and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Flea Bottom Alley
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel and sacrifice Flea Bottom Alley to put a [thenightswatch] character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand. Then, draw 1 card.

cards.name: R'hllor Infiltrator
cards.text: Dominance Action: Kneel R'hllor Infiltrator to choose an opponent. Give control of R'hllor Infiltrator to that player and gain 1 power for your faction.

cards.name: King's Gate
cards.text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you have 5 or more power on your faction card, sacrifice King's Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

cards.name: Ser Mandon Moore
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Ser Mandon Moore comes out of shadows, choose an opponent. That player must choose and kill a character he or she controls unless he or she chooses and discards 2 cards from his or her hand.

cards.name: Lion Gate
cards.text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you control 2 or more cards in shadows, sacrifice Lion Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

cards.name: Baelor Blacktyde
cards.text: Each opponent cannot play copies of events that are in his or her discard pile.

cards.name: Iron Gate
cards.text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you are the first player, sacrifice Iron Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

cards.name: Viserion
cards.text: Ambush (5). No attachments. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Viserion is attacking, discard 1 card from your hand to have Viserion gain intimidate until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Dragon Gate
cards.text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you control 2 or more attachments, sacrifice Dragon Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

cards.name: Southron Escort
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Discard another card from shadows to put Southron Escort into play from shadows.

cards.name: River Gate
cards.text: Limited. Challenges Action: If you have lost 2 or more challenges this phase, sacrifice River Gate to draw 2 cards. +1 Income.

cards.name: Littlefinger
cards.text: Shadow (6). Stealth. Reaction: After a character you control comes out of shadows, place up to 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, draw that many cards. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: White Sword Tower
cards.text: Each Kingsguard character you control gets +1 STR. Each player that does not control a Kingsguard character cannot play more than 1 event each phase.

cards.name: City of Secrets
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player draws 2 cards. Then, each player without a City plot card in his or her used pile chooses and discards 2 cards from his or her hand.

cards.name: At the Gates
cards.text: When Revealed: Search your deck for a limited location with printed cost 1 or lower, reveal it, and add it to your hand (put it into play instead if there are no City plot cards in your used pile). Shuffle your deck.
